meanings.definition: The chemical element with the symbol Fr and atomic number 87.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study franciums to learn more about their properties.
meanings.sent3: The party was like a box of franciums - explosive and unpredictable!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like franciums in water, spreading joy all around.
meanings.sent5: The glow of franciums in the dark was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: I have two franciums in my collection of elements.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table lists various elements, including franciums.
meanings.sent3: The franciums on the shelf seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of franciums, each with its own story.
meanings.sent5: The bag was heavy with the weight of franciums, each one a treasure.
